revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Hame |model=Wi-Fi Disk |revision=(S3) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/08/2013 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mobile NAS, |fcc_id=R7F-S3 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=SD Card |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=battery,portable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=HAME S3_XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^HAME S3_[A-F0-3]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.169.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=9C:41:7C |oui_eth= }} ''HameCloud''
This seem to be an '''Android''' and '''iOS''' compatible ''cloud'' storage device.
"S3-V1.2" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The RAM chip used may be EM63A165TS-6G (32MB).
Default settings are per the FCC manual. :The default SSID pattern is specified as '''HAME S3_XXXX'''. :The example WiFi PSK is specified as '''1234567890'''.
[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tiBxVLvD1i8 '''Hame''''s intro video 1] and [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CdQDKbS0wFQ video 2] :9C:41:7C ('''Hame''') OUI shown on the label in video 1
